title: Vanishing days
lyrics:
Beolsseo myeochiljjae
I jag-eun bang-an-e hollo anj-a
Geujeo meonghani
Kkeojyeoissneun TVleul balabwa
Nega tteonagadeon geunal hamkke salajin

Geu modeun sigandeul-i nal nal deo oelobge hae



Naega mwol eotteohge haeya neol

Dasi dollyeonoh-eul su issneunji

Uliga mwol eotteon jalmos-eul haeseo

Ileohge doeeobeolyeossneunji



Geujeo amuleon

Saeng-gag eobs-i jinachyeo beolyeossdeon

Geu sungandeul-i

Ileohge sojunghan geoyeossguna



Jogeumman deo dam-adulgeol

Modu salajil chueogdeul-i

Nan geulibgo tto geuliwo



Naega mwol eotteohge haeya neol

Dasi dollyeonoh-eul su issneunji

Uliga mwol eotteon jalmos-eul haeseo

Ileohge doeeobeolyeossneunji



Deo huhoedoeneun geon

Eodikkajiga salang-ieossgo

Eonjebuteoga ibyeol-ieossneunji

Modeun ge da huimihaejyeo beolin geos gat-aseo



Naega mwol eotteohge haeya

Neol dasi usge hal su iss-eulji

Uliga deo jiwogaya hal

Yagsogdeul-i ajig nam-ass-eulji
